column4: i have a problem...when i try to search a package in synaptics it can't be found..but when i open terminal and write apt-get install smplayer for example, it is installing
are you -sure- you have the "all" group selected when searching? otherwise it searches the group you have selected.
all is selected yes...when i try to look for packages by Origin it says there's no package in universe, multiverse repos
